file_insights.purpose: Verify agent tool loop execution in LangGraph

patterns_discovered: Comprehensive test suite for verifying agent tool execution loop
Using mock objects to simulate LLM and tool interactions
Async test framework for complex graph-based workflows
Systematic verification of graph structure and edge conditions
gotchas_discovered: Ensuring correct routing between agent and tool nodes
Verifying tool execution and result processing
Handling multiple message types in the graph
Tracking execution flow through mock responses
recommendations: Continue using comprehensive test suites for complex graph-based AI workflows
Leverage async testing for simulating intricate interaction patterns
Use mock objects to test edge cases without real API dependencies
Implement detailed logging and step tracking in test frameworks
